Reviews.Title: Nokia x3
Reviews.Author: sp "srinivas"
Reviews.Content: Great phone for the price. I got it for 100 dollar in a deal. Its sturdy, battery is good, it has radio, it comes with 2 gb card, 3.2 MP camerca and I am using it since 1 year. Its lot better than the phones I can get with the service.

Reviews.Title: Nokia X3 Red/Black unlocked cell phone
Reviews.Author: Maradee J. Lee ""dedejean""
Reviews.Content: If you like small phones, this is a good one.  The keyboard is conveniently tucked away so the keys do not get "accidentally" used.  Nice choice!

Reviews.Title: New Genuine Nokia X3-00 Unlocked GSM X3
Reviews.Author: A. Saydaliev
Reviews.Content: The reason why I gave full star is the customer service of Nokia company in USA. the phone is stylish. The product is good and has fabulous battery power. I use phone whole day for talking and change still is up. It's good feature compare to big screen smartphone that leak on charge.If you talk a lot over the phone and tired of phone out charge then you choice has to be this phone.

Reviews.Title: Excelente!
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: Excelente! los recomiendo 100%, el envío fue rápido, el articulo llego tal cual fue descrito en las características del producto.. Compra realizada desde Venezuela!!

ProductInfo.Features:
The Nokia X3 features a 3+ Megapixel Camera, A2DP, Bluetooth, Calendar, Camera, Edge, Email Client, FM Radio, High-Speed
Data GPRS, Megapixel Camera,Clip General 2G Network GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
Size Dimensions 96 x 49.3 x 14.1 mm, 65.8 cc, Memory Card Slot, MP3, Slide Form, Video Capture, Video
Weight 103 g
Display Type TFT, 256K colors
